attributes.additional_details:
Landlords have been really greedy in the last 20 years they buy cheap and rent many properties whilst spending thier money abroad and not contributing to the system , They prey on the less well off so if they can afford to own several properties, make them responsible for the council tax , they have become dependant on government paying 90% of the rents they charge whilst they live a luxury lifestyle abroad .
If the landlords disagree take all of thier property off them using bailiffs to see how they like it.Pure Greed.
